ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And the Garden will be brought up close to those with taqwa, not far away:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And Paradise will be brought near, not far from those who took heed for themselves and feared God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And when Paradise shall be brought close to the God-fearing, and will no longer be far away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Paradise will be brought near for the pious ones
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Paradise will be brought close to the pious, not far away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Paradise will be Uzlifat to those who had Taqwa, not far off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the garden shall be brought near to those who guard (against evil), not far off:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Paradise shall be brought forward to the godfearing, not afar:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the Garden is brought nigh for those who kept from evil, no longer distant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Paradise will be brought near to the righteous and will no longer be far away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And brought nigh will be the Garden Unto the God-fearing, not far-off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And paradise will be brought near for the Godwary, it will not be distant [any more]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Garden will be brought nigh to the Righteous,- no more a thing distant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Paradise will be brought near to the Muttaqun (pious - see V. 2:2) not far off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Paradise, which is not far away, shall be brought closer to those who were cautious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Paradise will be brought closer to the pious, not far away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:31] And Paradise will be brought near for the God-fearing, to a place, not far [anymore], from them, and so they see it, whereupon it will be said to them:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the Garden is brought nigh for those who kept from evil) those who warded off disbelief, idolatry and indecencies, (no longer distant) from them.
